summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2859, for the improvement of Baker Avenue, from Ross Place to West Forty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34684 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
